TestDescription.name: Microsoft IIS version disclosure
TestDescription.Description: The HTTP responses returned by this web application include a header named [bold]Server[/bold]. The value of this header includes the version of Microsoft IIS server.
TestDescription.Impact: The HTTP header may disclose sensitive information. This information can be used to launch further attacks.
TestDescription.Recommendation: Microsoft IIS should be configured to remove unwanted HTTP response headers from the response. Consult web references for more information.
